query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `educationalVideos` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `categoryId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `videoUrl` varchar(512) NOT NULL,
  `thumbnailUrl` varchar(512),
  `duration` int NOT NULL,
  `tags` json,
  `relatedCompetencies` json,
  `relatedPIRDimensions` json,
  `difficultyLevel` enum('basico','intermediario','avancado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'basico',
  `targetAudience` json,
  `viewCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `completionCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `averageWatchTime` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `featured` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `educationalVideos_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
command:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `educationalVideos` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `categoryId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `videoUrl` varchar(512) NOT NULL,
  `thumbnailUrl` varchar(512),
  `duration` int NOT NULL,
  `tags` json,
  `relatedCompetencies` json,
  `relatedPIRDimensions` json,
  `difficultyLevel` enum('basico','intermediario','avancado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'basico',
  `targetAudience` json,
  `viewCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `completionCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `averageWatchTime` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `featured` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `educationalVideos_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
